::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod continued to fire on the Newcomers.
He then heard Savanna say "Sure." Hot Rod was kinda shocked.
Between the fighting, he had forgotton he had asked.
"Great! After we slag these guys, we can go."
He fired more shots at Anubis.
